channel.title: How/where do you edit animations?
channel.description:
How/Where do you edit the animations of objects? I wish to make it so barricades from Castle Wars burn three seconds longer. I am guessing I need to look for the animation of it and some how make it longer?
If so, where do I look, etc? I just want the animation to last twice as long as it currently does.

item.title: How/where do you edit animations?

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Why did you make another topic for this?

Read full topic
